verse: “Peace I leave with you; my peace I give to you...”
reflection: Jesus offers not a fragile calm but a lasting peace — rooted in His presence, not our control.

verse: “Be still, and know that I am God.”
reflection: In stillness, we rediscover that we are not alone — God is always near, always in control.

verse: “I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.”
reflection: Christ is your strength — not your ability, your energy, or your willpower.
